CustomField.description: Annualized return on investment. Monthly amount x 12 months / Original Capital Cost
CustomField.formula: IF(OR( BLANKVALUE(SBQQ__UnitCost__c, 0) = 0, BLANKVALUE(Monthly_Amount__c, 0) = 0), NULL, IF(OR(Trans_Category__c = "Rental", Trans_Category__c = "Carry On"), Monthly_Amount__c * 12 / Total_Cost__c / 100, NULL))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Annualized return on investment. Monthly amount x 12 months / Original Capital Cost
CustomField.label: ROI
